segments.text: Next to the boy, I notice a little girl.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing there, looking up at him and the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, clearly expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, but her posture is very attentive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a definite look of anticipation on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's a willing accomplice in this little cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet to see siblings cooperating, even in mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught by the woman, who is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman won't know what hit her when she discovers the empty jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sad thought that this playful moment could lead to trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hopeful eyes make me wish they succeed without any mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR
